objects.text: When Life Gets Sour, Sweeten It With Kindness
Beautiful decorative design • Vintage-inspired rustic finish
Perfect for kitchen, living room, or office wall décor

product_details.name: Rustic Lemon Wreath Sign with Inspirational Message - 'When Life Gets Sour, Sweeten It With Kindness'
product_details.description:
• Beautiful decorative metal/tin sign with lemon wreath design
• Inspiring motivational quote perfect for home décor
• Vibrant yellow lemons and green leaves artwork
• Vintage-inspired rustic finish with elegant typography
• Perfect for kitchen, living room, or office wall décor
• High-quality printed design with durable construction
• Charming farmhouse-style aesthetic
• Ideal size for wall display or countertop placement
• Makes a thoughtful housewarming or motivational gift
• Easy to hang with pre-installed mounting hardware

banner_details:
This banner features a cozy, rustic-themed design showcasing a lemon wreath product. The main heading labeled as `heading` uses a classic serif font in a rich green color, setting an inviting and homely tone. Just beneath it, the `tagline` provides a whimsical, motivational phrase in an elegant script font. The center of the layout is anchored by the `product_image`, displaying a wreath garnished with lemons and paired with a vintage style lemonade bottle. Two description texts (`description_1` and `description_2`) give additional product charm. At the bottom, the `price` is prominently displayed in a bold yellow-orange font, adjacent to a green rounded rectangular `cta_button` containing the call-to-action text `cta`.

**Color Palette:**
- Cream White: `#F5F1E6` (Background)
- Olive Green: `#5A7247` (Headings, descriptions, and CTA button)
- Warm Brown: `#755E3B` (Tagline)
- Lemon Yellow: `#F3D05E` (Decorative elements)
- Light Green: `#CFDE9F` (Accent shapes)
- Price Highlight Orange: `#B5730F`
- White: `#FFFFFF` (CTA text)
product_color: The product image features a refreshing and uplifting color palette perfect for a summer-themed advertisement banner. Dominant hues include vibrant lemon yellow (#FEE440), used on the lemons to evoke freshness and positivity; leafy greens (#228B22 and #A2D149) offer a natural contrast and tie the design to nature. The metallic silver-gray background (#C0C0C0) gives an industrial yet clean feel, allowing the handwritten black text (#2F2F2F) to pop clearly. These colors are well balanced—yellow and green accents are bold yet softened by soft shadows and highlights, blending into the cool tones of the metal. The lemonade (#F3FDEC) adds a subtle pastel touch.
